title: Bachelor of Science in Organizational and Professional Communication
description: At KSU, the Organizational and Professional Communication degree is designed to prepare you for a successful professional career in management, training, development, human resources, consulting, or related fields. You will learn about interviewing, intercultural communication, leadership communication, mass communication and communication law, ethics, diversity and more.
careers: Account Manager, Admissions Counselor, Alumni Coordinator, Benefits Administrator, Business Manager.
